ACCOMMODATION

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Paris, first city for tourism in France and worldwide, has many sorts of accommodation to welcome visitors. The real challenge is not so much to find a hotel but to find an accommodation environmentally responsible that takes into account the environmental impact of our regular trips.

For that, certification labels like the european ecolabel, the certication labels Clef Verte, Green Globe, Earth Check and ISO 9001/14001 serve as a guarantee for finding a place which put efforts in reducing our consumption. .

The hotels having these kind of certification labels are normally required to consume less water, energy and chemical products. The ensuing behabiors are generally the reduction of sheets and towels use, the installation of low-energy light bulbs, of light and heating system timer, waste sorting…

More information to find an environmentally responsible accommodation here.

 

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
